ygData.msgSnippet: Ice and Lunarpine aproached the location of the alliance bots when Lunarpine caught a scent in the air, Serpentor? he thought remembering the last time the

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Ice and Lunarpine aproached the location of the alliance bots when Lunarpine
caught a scent in the air, "Serpentor?" he thought remembering the last time
the two had met.

Ice shuttered as she caught Lunarpines tension building. His thoughts were
being broadcast loud and clear. She too remembered thier last meeting. She
fealt a combination of fear and anger well up inside of her. Doubts started
to fill her mind about Veratis making her the leader. She radiod back to the
CF, we have contact, be ready they're moving in fast.

Lunarpine transformed to his robot mode and headed for the scent. Ice called
him back and told him to wait for them. Lunarpine ducked under cover and
waited for his prey.
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 13, 2000 5:24 PM
Subject: Alliance - March!


> (Dark One and Sixshot are not at the scene of the battle, they vamoosed to
> regroup with other Alliance members)
>
> The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double
> Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Ares/Serpentor:
>
>
> Dark One hovered in mid air, Sixshot hovering beside him.
>
> "Alliance forces, mobilize!  Attack the Cybertronian Fire with everything
you
> have!  Take no prisoners unless they are Iron Raptor!  Remember your
priority
> targets!  The Mafia is already attacking them.  So move out, and CRUSH
> EVERYTHING!" Dark One yelled, turning his form around and blasting off
toward
> the CF that wasn't even two miles away, keeping pace with Sixshot and the
> marching forces below, and Injector, Bumblebee, and Manterror who were
flying
> through the air in the biped modes.
>
> "Shall I transform, brothers?" Dark Claw asked his brethren.
> "Indeed." replied Demon Wulf, who watched Dark Claw transform into his
attack
> vehicle form.  "Excellent." is all Demon Wulf said, climbing up on his
> brother's form and sitting on top of it, Flesh Ripper following his
example.
>
> Double Punch activated his stealth mode, his body going into cloak.  He
armed
> his energy-signature seeking missiles and launched Cyberbee into the air,
> running off after his comrades.
>
> Serpentor slithered on his scaled belly, trying to keep up with everyone
else.
>
>
>
>
